name: Roary's Amazing Amusement Park
description:
WELCOME TO ROARY'S AMAZING AMUSEMENT PARK!!

Roary's Amazing Amusement Park was once a popular place for people of all ages to enjoy their day off.  The park's mascot, Roary the lion was probably the biggest reason for that. His friendly manner attracted the interests of thousands of children yearly. But the downfall of this amusement park came quicker than expected. Due to unknown reasons, the park was closed and abandoned just 10 years after it was opened. The owners didn't make any statements, a night shift employee even stated that he wasn't informed of the closing until several weeks after. 

What happened at this park? Episode 1 (Gilla's Ride):

Some time after the park was closed, you, the player break in and make your way through the park, first encountering Gilla the Giraffe in the park's famous roller coaster "Gilla's Ride". The Giraffe was always described to be very friendly and formal, so nobody would think any bad of it. After all, it's a giraffe!

CONTROLS (IMPORTANT!!):

WASD - WALK

MOUSE - TURN AROUND

SHIFT - SPRINT

LMB - USE GRAPPLING GUN

LEFT CONTROL - CROUCH (!!!)
